alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 4:26AM AKDT until March 20 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING FROM DILLINGHAM NORTH AND WEST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bristol Bay from Dillingham north and west, including Togiak. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeasterly winds will continue to increase to as high as 35 mph this morning as a front pushes from west to east across Bristol Bay, allowing blowing snow to reduce visibility. Increasing temperatures and diminishing winds by late Monday morning will end the threat for blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
